Uses of Interface
org.eclipse.gef.mvc.fx.parts.IRootPart

Packages that use IRootPart
Package
Description
org.eclipse.gef.mvc.fx.parts
This package contains all JavaFX-specific IContentPart, IVisualPart, IFeedbackPart, and IHandlePart implementations and related classes.
org.eclipse.gef.mvc.fx.viewer
This package contains a JavaFX-specific IViewer implementation: InfiniteCanvasViewer.

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    LayeredRootPart
    The LayeredRootPart is an IRootPart that manages a number of layers for the visualization, namely, the content layer, feedback layer, and handle layer.
